items.quote: DocAider has transformed how we manage our documentation. The AI chat feature saves us hours of searching through documents.
items.author: Sarah J., Product Manager

items.quote: The ability to create separate knowledge bases for different projects has been a game-changer for our team's organization.
items.author: Michael T., Team Lead

items.quote: I love how easy it is to share specific knowledge bases with clients while keeping other documents private.
items.author: Lisa R., Consultant

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Create your first knowledge base or explore existing public resources.
